== Koodaranji (627412) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Koodaranji is a village in the [[Kozhikode]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 8703 hectares and harbouring 4423 households with total population of 18678 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 35 km. Male population is 9242 and female population is 9436. Scheduled Caste Population is 812 and Scheduled Tribes population is 627. Census Location Code of the village is 627412<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 15836 (84.78%)
* Literate male population: 7919 (85.68%)
* Literate female population: 7917 (83.9%)
